MPA_DESCRIPTION: A system designed to improve safety within university facilities through sensors.
MISION_DESCRIPTION: Provide innovative solutions that prevent and monitor accidents in the university environment, using advanced sensor technology to ensure a safe space for everyone.
VISION_DESCRIPTION: Establish ourselves as leaders in university safety, driving innovation in real-time monitoring technologies to promote a safer and more protected academic environment.
QUIENES_SOMOS_DESCRIPTION: We are a group of students monitoring university safety. Our purpose is to offer comprehensive solutions through sensors to help us prevent and manage incidents.
